DELTA: The fourth letter of the modern Greek alphabet Δ, δ.
FRONTIER: The part of a country which borders or faces another country or unsettled region
SOUTHWEST: The compass point halfway between south and west, specifically 225°, abbreviated as SW.
SPIRIT: The soul of a person or other creature. What moves through experience into self-definition as souls purpose.
VIRGIN: A person who has never had sexual intercourse, or sometimes, one who has never engaged in any sexual activity at all.
